item.title: Pi dicing donator ;3
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

    public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {
                synchronized(c) {
                        int targetSlot=0;
                        if (wearID > 15085 && wearID < 15102 && c.isDonor == 1) {
                                if (c.clanId >= 0){
                                        c.useDice(wearID, true);
                                }else{
                                        c.sendMessage("You must be in a clan chat channel to do that.");
                                }
                                        return false;
                        }

this is donator only but if your not a donator it equips them ;l
anyone know a sort of fix? so it tells them the message instead of wearing them
